call up.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: I’m going to call up and cancel my subscription.
He called me up to tell me about it.
call up.translation[0].definitions[1].de: if you call up information on a computer, you make the computer show it to you
call up.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: I called up their website, but it didn’t have the information I was looking for.
call up.translation[0].definitions[2].de: to officially order someone to join the army, navy, or air force
call up.translation[0].definitions[2].ex: I was called up three months after war broke out.
call up.translation[0].definitions[3].de: to choose someone for a national sports team
call up.translation[0].definitions[3].ex: Hurst was called up for the game against Mexico.
call up.translation[0].definitions[4].de: to produce something or make it appear
call up.translation[0].definitions[4].ex: She can call up the spirits of the dead.
call up.translation[1].definitions[0].de: an order to join the army, navy etc
call up.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: He got his call-up papers in July.
call up.translation[1].definitions[1].de: an opportunity or invitation to play for a professional sports team, especially a national one
call up.translation[1].definitions[1].ex: Stewart’s recent call-up to the Wales squad
call up.translation[2].definitions[0].ex: Several customers called up to complain.
call up.translation[2].definitions[1].de: if you call up information on a computer, you make the computer show it to you
call up.translation[2].definitions[1].ex: Here’s how to call up the latest Stock Exchange prices.
